name: Fulverice
description: A legendary ice predator that instantly freezes any water it touches. Water-type monsters flee in terror from its presence, as it can turn entire oceans to ice.

ability.name: Absolute Freeze
ability.description: All Water-type moves become Ice-type and freeze the user. Water-types take 2x damage from all attacks. Immune to Water moves.

moves.name: Glacial Dominion
moves.description: Freezes the entire battlefield. Super effective against Water types.

moves.name: Frost Bite
moves.description: A vicious bite that always freezes Water-type targets.

moves.name: Absolute Zero
moves.description: The ultimate ice attack. Instantly defeats Water-types if it hits.

moves.name: Ice Barrier
moves.description: Creates an ice wall that blocks Water moves and raises both defenses.

habitat: The deepest frozen abyssal trenches where water fears to flow
